sv_name.label: Nombre del servidor
sv_name.tooltip: Name displayed in the server list

sv_port.label: Server Port
sv_port.tooltip: Port the server will listen on

sv_external_port.label: External Port
sv_external_port.tooltip: Port to report to the master servers (e.g. in case of a firewall rename)

sv_max_clients.label: Max Clients
sv_max_clients.tooltip: Number of clients that can be connected to the server at the same time

sv_max_clients_per_ip.label: Max Clients per IP
sv_max_clients_per_ip.tooltip: Number of clients with the same ip that can be connected to the server at the same time

sv_high_bandwidth.label: High Bandwidth
sv_high_bandwidth.tooltip: Use high bandwidth mode, for LAN servers only

sv_rcon_password.label: RCon Password
sv_rcon_password.tooltip: Password to access the remote console (if not set, rcon is disabled)

password.label: Password
password.tooltip: Password to connect to the server

console_output_level.label: Console Output Level
console_output_level.tooltip: Adjust the amount of messages in the console

sv_rcon_max_tries.label: RCon Max Tries
sv_rcon_max_tries.tooltip: Maximum number of tries for remote console authetication

sv_rcon_bantime.label: RCon Ban Time
sv_rcon_bantime.tooltip: Time (in minutes) a client gets banned if remote console authentication fails (0 makes it just use kick)

sv_auto_demo_max.label: Auto Demo Max
sv_auto_demo_max.tooltip: Maximum number of automatically recorded demos (0 = no limit)

ec_bindaddr.label: External Console Bind Address
ec_bindaddr.tooltip: Address to bind the external console to. Anything but 'localhost' is dangerous

ec_port.label: External Console Port
ec_port.tooltip: Port to use for the external console

ec_bantime.label: External Console Ban Time
ec_bantime.tooltip: The time a client gets banned if econ authentication fails. 0 just closes the connection

ec_auth_timeout.label: External Console Auth Timeout
ec_auth_timeout.tooltip: Time in seconds before the the econ authentication times out

ec_output_level.label: External Console Output Level
ec_output_level.tooltip: Adjusts the amount of information in the external console
